title: Stock market news live updates: Stocks extend losses as Russia intensifies attacks on Ukraine - Yahoo Finance
content: Stock market news live updates: Stocks extend losses as Russia intensifies attacks on Ukraine  Yahoo Finance
description: U.S. stocks were muted at Tuesday's open following another volatile day on Wall Street as investors weighed intensifying Russian attacks on Ukraine and an onslaught of new sanctions by the West against the likelihood geopolitical uncertainty could knock the Federal Reserve off course for an aggressive first bump in interest rates.
